data.actual_result: The user selected appears to be slightly misaligned, it's moved a bit upwards in the input field. Ceiling padding is less than floor padding.
data.expected_result: The user selected should appear in the input field enclosed in a box, which has the same paddings for both above and below it, like any other zoom level.
data.short_description: In 90% zoom level, users to be added into a DM in the DM invite box are slightly moved upwards in the input field.
data.steps_to_repro: - Use Discord in 90% zoom. - Open DM invite box. - Choose any user. - Observe carefully.
